name: BloodRayne

files.installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer
game:
  appid: 3810
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/GOG.com/BloodRayne 1/rayne.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/GOG.com/BloodRayne 1/
installer:
- input_menu:
    description: Choose horizontal resolution
    id: RESOLUTIONX
    options:
    - '1920': '1920'
    - '1600': '1600'
    - '2560': '2560'
    preselect: '1920'
- input_menu:
    description: Choose vertical resolution
    id: RESOLUTIONY
    options:
    - '1080': '1080'
    - '1600': '1600'
    - '1440': '1440'
    preselect: '1080'
- task:
    app: quartz devenum dinput dinput8 xinput1_3
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- write_config:
    data:
      Graphics:
        gamePIXX: $INPUT_RESOLUTIONX
        gamePIXY: $INPUT_RESOLUTIONY
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/GOG.com/BloodRayne 1/system/rayne.ini
wine:
  Audio: alsa
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: ${INPUT_RESOLUTIONX}x${INPUT_RESOLUTIONY}
  overrides:
    devenum: n
    dinput: n
    dinput8: n
    quartz: n
    winegstreamer: disabled
    xinput1_3: n
